subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Thomas Bach, a German lawyer and Olympic gold medal winner, replaces Jacques Rogge, with the Sochi Games facing potential protests as part of widespread criticism of a new Russian law viewed as antigay.
snippet: Thomas Bach, a German lawyer and Olympic gold medal winner, replaces Jacques Rogge, with the Sochi Games facing potential protests as part of widespread criticism of a new Russian law viewed as antigay.
